Call for Fellowship

Call For Submissions

Important Dates :

Presentation/Abstract

✓ Last date for submitting the application : 15th June, 2023 – Closed.
✓ Notification for the award of fellowship : 30th June, 2023

✓ Last date for submitting the application :
15rd May, 2023
✓ Notification for the award of fellowship :
31st May, 2023

 

Fellowship Program for ITC Conference 2023 is live !

The 7th IEEE International Test Conference India (ITC India 2023) invites Students, Research Scholars, and Faculty members working in the relevant fields of VLSI Design and Test for applying for the fellowship program. ITC India has been offering generous fellowships to students and faculty members of various Indian academic institutions. The fellowship provides complimentary registration to attend all the Tutorials, Keynotes, and Technical Sessions.

At ITC India, design, test, and yield professionals can confront challenges faced by the industry and learn how these challenges are being addressed by the combined efforts of academia, design tool, and equipment suppliers, designers, and test engineers.

  • We will be using an entirely online application process. A Gmail account is required for submitting the application: ITC INDIA 2023 Fellowship Form (google.com)
  • Applications will be considered on a first-come-first-served basis.
  • Faculty members, Research scholars, and students should upload a scanned copy of their Institution Identity card along with the application.
  • Please submit only one form per applicant.

Important Guidelines

  • The authors from an academic institution whose paper is accepted in ITC India 2023, will get the preference for the award of the fellowship.
  • Research scholars and students applying for the fellowship award must be involved in research areas related to VLSI Design & Test.
  • The faculty members applying for the fellowship award must have been associated with teaching or guiding research projects in VLSI Design & Test and take an active part in conducting workshops or seminars in these areas.
  • The selected fellows must prepare a poster presentation on any topic from the field of VLSI Testing that they will be presenting at the conference.
  • It is imperative that the fellows attend tutorials and presentations on all days. A record of attendance would be maintained for the same. A minimum of 90% of attendance is mandatory to receive a participant certificate.
  • Please visit the conference website for detailed updates from time to time.
Submit Fellowship

Note: For any concerns/queries, please send an email to: itc-india-fellowship@itcindiatestweek.org
